verses.verse: For <S%G1063><s%> yourselves <S%G846><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> entrance in <S%G1529><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> it was <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5754><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in vain <S%G2756><s%>:

But <S%G235><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> after that we had suffered before <S%G4310><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> were shamefully entreated <S%G5195><s%> <S%G5685><s%>, as <S%G2531><s%> ye know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%>, at <S%G1722><s%> Philippi <S%G5375><s%>, we were bold <S%G3955><s%> <S%G5662><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5658><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> contention <S%G73><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> exhortation <S%G3874><s%> was not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> deceit <S%G4106><s%>, nor <S%G3761><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> uncleanness <S%G167><s%>, nor <S%G3777><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> guile <S%G1388><s%>:

But <S%G235><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> we were allowed <S%G1381><s%> <S%G5769><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> to be put in trust <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5683><s%> with the gospel <S%G2098><s%>, even so <S%G3779><s%> we speak <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5719><s%>; not <S%G3756><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> pleasing <S%G700><s%> <S%G5723><s%> men <S%G444><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, which trieth <S%G1381><s%> <S%G5723><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> at any time <S%G4218><s%> used we <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5675><s%> flattering <S%G2850><s%> words <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3056><s%>, as <S%G2531><s%> ye know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%>, nor <S%G3777><s%> a cloke <S%G1722><s%> <S%G4392><s%> of covetousness <S%G4124><s%>; 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> is witness <S%G3144><s%>:

Nor <S%G3777><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> men <S%G444><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> <S%G5723><s%> we glory <S%G1391><s%>, neither <S%G3777><s%> of <S%G575><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, nor <S%G3777><s%> yet of <S%G575><s%> others <S%G243><s%>, when we might <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5740><s%> have been <S%G1511><s%> <S%G5750><s%> burdensome <S%G1722><s%> <S%G922><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> the emissarys <S%G652><s%> of Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> we were <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5675><s%> gentle <S%G2261><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3319><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, even as <S%G5613><s%> a nurse <S%G5162><s%> cherisheth <S%G302><s%> <S%G2282><s%> <S%G5725><s%> her <S%G1438><s%> children <S%G5043><s%>:

So <S%G3779><s%> being affectionately desirous <S%G2442><s%> <S%G5734><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%>, we were willing <S%G2106><s%> <S%G5707><s%> to have imparted <S%G3330><s%> <S%G5629><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> only <S%G3440><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> our own <S%G1438><s%> souls <S%G5590><s%>, because <S%G1360><s%> ye were <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5769><s%> dear <S%G27><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> ye remember <S%G3421><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, our <S%G2257><s%> labour <S%G2873><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> travail <S%G3449><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> labouring <S%G2038><s%> <S%G5740><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>, because <S%G4314><s%> we would <S%G1912><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> be chargeable <S%G1912><s%> <S%G5658><s%> unto any <S%G5100><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%>, we preached <S%G2784><s%> <S%G5656><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

Ye <S%G5210><s%> are witnesses <S%G3144><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> also, how <S%G5613><s%> holily <S%G3743><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> justly <S%G1346><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> unblameably <S%G274><s%> we behaved ourselves <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5675><s%> among you <S%G5213><s%> that believe <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5723><s%>:

As <S%G2509><s%> ye know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> how <S%G5613><s%> we exhorted <S%G3870><s%> <S%G5723><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> comforted <S%G3888><s%> <S%G5740><s%> and charged <S%G3140><s%> <S%G5734><s%> every <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of you <S%G5209><s%> <S%G5216><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> a father <S%G3962><s%> doth his <S%G1438><s%> children <S%G5043><s%>,

<S%G2532><s%> That <S%G1519><s%> ye <S%G5209><s%> would walk <S%G4043><s%> <S%G5658><s%> worthy <S%G516><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, who hath called <S%G2564><s%> <S%G5723><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G1438><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>.

For this <S%G5124><s%> cause <S%G1223><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> thank <S%G2168><s%> <S%G5719><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> without ceasing <S%G89><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%>, when ye received <S%G3880><s%> <S%G5631><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> which ye heard <S%G189><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>, ye received <S%G1209><s%> <S%G5662><s%> it not <S%G3756><s%> as the word <S%G3056><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> in truth <S%G230><s%>, the word <S%G3056><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> effectually worketh <S%G1754><s%> <S%G5731><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> that believe <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5723><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, became <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5675><s%> followers <S%G3402><s%> of the Congregations <S%G1577><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Judaea <S%G2449><s%> are <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> have suffered <S%G3958><s%> <S%G5627><s%> like things <S%G5024><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> your own <S%G2398><s%> countrymen <S%G4853><s%>, even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> they have <S%G846><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%>:

Who both <S%G2532><s%> killed <S%G615><s%> <S%G5660><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> their own <S%G2398><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> have persecuted <S%G1559><s%> <S%G5660><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they please <S%G700><s%> <S%G5723><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> are contrary <S%G1727><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G444><s%>:

Forbidding <S%G2967><s%> <S%G5723><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5658><s%> to the goyim <S%G1484><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they might be saved <S%G4982><s%> <S%G5686><s%>, to <S%G1519><s%> fill up <S%G378><s%> <S%G5658><s%> their <S%G846><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> alway <S%G3842><s%>: for <S%G1161><s%> the wrath <S%G3709><s%> is come <S%G5348><s%> <S%G5656><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the uttermost <S%G5056><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G2249><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, being taken <S%G642><s%> <S%G5685><s%> from <S%G575><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> for <S%G4314><s%> a short <S%G5610><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> in presence <S%G4383><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> in heart <S%G2588><s%>, endeavoured <S%G4704><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the more abundantly <S%G4056><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5629><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> face <S%G4383><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> desire <S%G1939><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is our <S%G2257><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> crown <S%G4735><s%> of rejoicing <S%G2746><s%>? <S%G2228><s%> Are not <S%G3780><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> in the presence <S%G1715><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> YY <S%G2962><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> coming <S%G3952><s%>?
